description.lang: ZP 3102 Z-Wave Motion Sensor(Temperature Sensor Build-In) Features:* Passive Infrared Sensor (PIR)* 2~10 meter Motion Range * 120 Degree Horizontal Angle Coverage* Temperature Function* Low battery detection* Panasonic CR123A Battery* Tamper Switch* 100ft line of sight* LED Status Indicator* Operating temp: -15oC~40oC* Working Voltage: 3V* Dimensions: 84*62*50mm* Frequency Available: US/EU/JP/IN/BR Version Available* On Japan Telec Certification Process* Taiwan NCC Approved
